title-group.article-title: The Valuation of Stochastic Cash Flows

abstract.p: This paper develops a flexible valuation model for uncertain income streams with infinite horizons. The paper assumes that cash flows grow according to a sequence of independent and identically distributed random variables, employs a risk-adjusted discount rate, and defines model prices as appropriate conditional expectations. The resulting model is consistent with various components of both the random walk hypothesis and the capital asset pricing model (the appropriate discount rate may be made a function of the covariance with the market return).
